title: The Curse
creator_credit: Fyzal Boulifa, Karim Debbagh, Gavin Humphries, Quark Films, British Film Institute and Film4
brief_description: Fatine has ventured far from the village to meet her older lover. When she is caught by a small boy, all she wants to do is go home.
creator_credit_for_label: Fyzal Boulifa, Karim Debbagh, Gavin Humphries, Quark Films, British Film Institute and Film4
